cgb_init_project.py¶

Sets up a Project to host multiple GBs (Jobs) using a particular potential all treated in a consistent manner.

Please cite:

  • Lee and Choi, MSMSE 12 (2004)
  • Huber et al., in preparation (2018)
cgb_init_project.main(args)¶
